DOC.brief_summary: The study determine effect behavioral weight loss program supplement Nutrisystem meal replacement weight , blood pressure , fast blood glucose , blood lipid level 12 week .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Nutrisystem Meal Provision Weight
DOC.detailed_description: Specific Aim 1- Compare two program , standard Internet weight loss program Internet behavioral weight loss program , enhance Nutrisystem meal provision , effectiveness produce weight loss improvement fast blood glucose , blood pressure , blood lipid level 12 week . Specific Aim 2- Determine usage acceptability two program . Overall Hypothesis : The Internet program Nutrisystem meal provision produce great improvement participant 's health ( weight , blood pressure , blood lipid , fast blood glucose ) standard Internet program alone 12 week . The acceptability usage program directly correlate weight loss participant . Recruitment Methods Participants recruit advertisement local newspaper . Randomization A two-group randomized design use . After meet exclusion/inclusion criterion , completion study measurement , provision write consent , individual randomize one two study group : ( 1 ) standard Internet behavioral weight loss program alone ( 2 ) standard Internet program plus Nutrisystem meal provision . Timeline Milestones Recruitment advertisement study place mid-December . Participants meet inclusion/exclusion criterion invite study information session first week January . Delivery Phase ( Jan.-April 2011 ) The delivery phase entail : ( 1 ) conducting study information session ; ( 2 ) baseline assessment ; ( 3 ) conduct 12-week Intervention ; ( 4 ) 12-week assessment . Dr. Webber conduct study information session qualify participant first week January . Interested participant ask sign consent form , fill motivation questionnaire , schedule appointment Clinical Research Center ( CRC ) University Kentucky baseline assessment height , weight , waist circumference , blood pressure , fast blood glucose blood lipid . Once measurement CRC take , participant randomize study group . At baseline group receive 2-hour weight loss group session register dietitian . The weight loss session include presentation information exercise dietary recommendation , overview energy balance , instruction self-monitoring , good dietary practice , exercise safety recommendation , orientation study website . Both group give password protect access standard Internet program . The website include 12 weekly lesson base Diabetes Prevention Program ( DPP ) , message board feature , link personal self-monitoring diary , library link diet , exercise , behavioral resource available web , weekly weight loss tip . The Nutrisystem group receive 2 week meal baseline 2-hour session . They ask return every two week clinic pick Nutrisystem meal . Evaluation Phase ( May-Oct. 2011 ) The evaluation phase project entail : ( 1 ) data entry , clean analysis ; ( 2 ) final report preparation ; ( 3 ) manuscript preparation .
DOC.criteria: Participants must ( 1 ) age 25 65 year old ; ( 2 ) BMI > 30 < 45 ; ( 3 ) home computer access Internet . Participants must : ( 1 ) medical diagnosis orthopedic joint problem may prohibit regular exercise ; ( 2 ) endorse first three item Physical Activity Readiness Questionnaire ( PARQ ) : heart problem , chest pain , faintness dizzy spell ; ( 3 ) endorse item PARQ without physician 's consent ; ( 4 ) hospitalization psychiatric disorder within last year ; ( 5 ) history anorexia bulimia nervosa ; ( 6 ) medical diagnosis cancer HIV exception skin cancer ; ( 7 ) diagnosis major psychiatric disorder ( i.e . bipolar disorder schizophrenia ) ; ( 8 ) pregnant , nursing , plan become pregnant within study period ; ( 9 ) less 9 month postpartum ; ( 10 ) recent weight loss > 10 pound ; ( 11 ) use centrallyactive medication , exception alcohol caffeine .
